title: American Business
summary: Learn how businesses work, plan a simple venture, track results, and understand ethics, marketing, and investing basics.

resources.title: SBA Learning Center
resources.description: Free mini-courses on planning, financing, and managing small businesses.

resources.title: Junior Achievement – Student Programs
resources.description: Entrepreneurship and personal finance activities geared toward teens.

resources.title: Investopedia: Introduction to Business
resources.description: Plain-language guide to core concepts like revenue, profit, and cash flow.

modules.title: How Business Works
modules.instructions: Define revenue, cost, profit, cash flow, and break-even in your own words. Give a real-world example for two terms.

modules.title: Plan a Micro-Venture
modules.instructions: Plan a simple business (lawn care, tutoring, crafts). Upload a 1-page plan: product/service, customers, price, costs, and expected profit.

modules.title: Run & Track Results
modules.instructions: Operate your venture for a short period OR simulate with 3–5 transactions. Upload a basic ledger (date, item, revenue, cost) and a profit summary.

modules.title: Marketing & Ethics
modules.prompt: Draft a simple ad or flyer. Then write a paragraph on truthful advertising and one ethical choice you’d make as an owner.

quiz.a: Stocks = ownership and variable returns; bonds = loans with fixed interest.
